## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-18.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron chest at position (-18.5, -48.5)
- Iron chest at position (-16.5, -48.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Stone furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0)
- Stone furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0)

### Coal Storage and Processing Facility at Position (44.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Iron chest at position (44.5, -80.5)
- Iron chest at position (45.5, -80.5)
- Iron chest at position (47.5, -80.5)
- Iron chest at position (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at position (43.5, -80.5)
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when transferring items without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to transfer them to another entity.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Check the supply chain to ensure that the inserter has access to the necessary source items to function properly.

### Errors when fuel is depleted
- Regularly refuel entities such as Burner Mining Drills and Stone Furnaces to prevent them from running out of fuel and halting production.

### Errors when storage is full
- Regularly check and empty storage chests to prevent them from becoming full and halting production processes.
